definition[0]: the amount of wealth, comfort, and other things that a particular person, group, country etc has
example[0]: a nation with a high standard of living
definition[1]: the amount of wealth or comfort that a person, group, or country has
example[1]: Two incomes are generally required tomaintain a decent middle-class standard of living.
example[2]: New businesses have created higher-paying jobs that give millions of people a far higher standard of living.
